code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import API from'../api';import'../Styles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MyBookings(){const[reservations,setReservations]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{API.get('my-reservations/').then(res=>setReservations(res.data)).catch(err=>{console.error("Failed to fetch reservations",err);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Reservations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here are your current bookings"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"room-card-container",children:reservations.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You have no current reservations."}):reservations.map(res=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"room-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:res.room.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",res.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Time:"})," ",res.start_time," - ",res.end_time]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'10px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/edit-reservation/".concat(res.id),className:"btn btn-pink",children:"Edit"})})]},res.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'20px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"btn btn-green",href:"/reserve",children:"Book a New Room"})})]});}export default MyBookings;
